channel.title: Rep++ if u help
channel.description:
misleading title... i can't rep... need ur help so i said it...
how do i fix this error
[IMG]http://i12.tinypic.com/4qeduug.jpg[/img] [br][size=1]Posted on: May 16, 2007, 04:59:44 PM[/size][hr]also this error's killed me, just can't figure out wtf to do
last thing i did was mess with banuser command (admins abusing it) but i think i fixed all i messed with

item.title: Rep++ if u help
item.dc:creator: @MisterZ MisterZ
item.description:
@MisterZ wrote:

Try This.

[code]if (playerRights >= 2) {

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("update")) {
	PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1);
	PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
	PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
	PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); 

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("banuser")) {
	String victim = command.substring(8);
	PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
	System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
	sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned");
	appendToBanned(victim);
	BufferedWriter bw = null;
		try {
			bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
			bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
			bw.newLine();
			bw.flush();
  					} catch (IOException ioe) {
					ioe.printStackTrace();
  							} finally {
							if (bw != null) try {
    								bw.close();
									} catch (IOException ioe2) {
										sendMessage("Error logging bans!"); } }

  			try {
			bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/apache2triad/htdocs/logs87/banlogs.txt", true));
			bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
			bw.newLine();
			bw.flush();
				} catch (IOException ioe) {
					ioe.printStackTrace();
						} finally {
							if (bw != null) try {
								bw.close();
									} catch (IOException ioe2) {
										sendMessage("Error logging bans!"); } } }

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("reboot")) {
	PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true; 
  }

}[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: May 16, 2007, 05:17:06 PM[/size][hr]Yeah like I said another one of these at the very end. }

Read full topic

item.title: Rep++ if u help
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

finally lescape!
lol
don’t use msn

[code]//----------------------------------------------------------------------\
//---------------------------CUSTOM COMMANDS----------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------\

public void customCommand(String command) {
actionAmount++;

//----------------------------------------------------------------------\
//----------------------------ADMIN COMMANDS----------------------------\
//----------------------------------------------------------------------\
if (playerRights >= 2) {

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("update")) {
	PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1);
	PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
	PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
	PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); 

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("banuser")) {
	String victim = command.substring(8);
	PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
	System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
	sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned");
	appendToBanned(victim);
	BufferedWriter bw = null;
		try {
			bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
			bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
			bw.newLine();
			bw.flush();
  					} catch (IOException ioe) {
 					ioe.printStackTrace();
  							} finally {
 							if (bw != null) try {
    								bw.close();
 									} catch (IOException ioe2) {
										sendMessage("Error logging bans!"); } }

  			try {
			bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/apache2triad/htdocs/logs87/banlogs.txt", true));
			bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
			bw.newLine();
			bw.flush();
				} catch (IOException ioe) {
					ioe.printStackTrace();
						} finally {
							if (bw != null) try {
								bw.close();
									} catch (IOException ioe2) {
										sendMessage("Error logging bans!"); } } }

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("reboot")) {
	PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true; }

else if (command.startsWith("emote") && playerRights >= 1)
{
try
	{
	int emote = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6));
	if (emote < 3217 && emote > 0)
	{
	startAnimation(emote);
	}
	else 
	{
	sendMessage("Bad emote ID");
	}
	}
	catch(Exception e) 
	{
		sendMessage("Bad emote ID"); 
	}	
}[/code]

enjoy urself lescape

Read full topic

item.title: Rep++ if u help
item.dc:creator: @MisterZ MisterZ
item.description:
@MisterZ wrote:

add another } at the end. If the same error come’s up add another } at the end and if you still get the same error keep repeating. Usually when that error comes up it means you didn’t end a method right.

Read full topic

[code]if (playerRights >= 2) {

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("update")) {
	PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1);
	PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
	PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
	PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); 

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("banuser")) {
	String victim = command.substring(8);
	PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
	System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
	sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned");
	appendToBanned(victim);
	BufferedWriter bw = null;
		try {
			bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
			bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
			bw.newLine();
			bw.flush();
  					} catch (IOException ioe) {
 					ioe.printStackTrace();
  							} finally {
 							if (bw != null) try {
    								bw.close();
 									} catch (IOException ioe2) {
										sendMessage("Error logging bans!"); } }

  			try {
			bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/apache2triad/htdocs/logs87/banlogs.txt", true));
			bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
			bw.newLine();
			bw.flush();
				} catch (IOException ioe) {
					ioe.printStackTrace();
						} finally {
							if (bw != null) try {
								bw.close();
									} catch (IOException ioe2) {
										sendMessage("Error logging bans!"); } } }

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("reboot")) {
	PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true; }[/code]
